item.title: 斯洛伐克总理试图取代欧洲央行卡齐米尔的努力失败了
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔可能会留任一段时间，尽管他的祖国斯洛伐克正在努力取而代之。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir may retain his post for some time, despite efforts in his homeland of Slovakia to replace him.】

item.title: 特朗普敲打美元，马克龙评估欧元开局
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普激起了欧洲领导人对货币市场的兴趣。【原文：Donald Trump has piqued European leaders’ interest in currency markets.】

item.title: 加纳新任央行行长将通过保持利率来显示实力
item.description: 加纳新任央行行长将维持基准利率不变，以显示其对抗顽固高通胀的决心。【原文：Ghana’s new central bank governor is set to show his resolve in fighting stubbornly high inflation by keeping the benchmark interest rate unchanged.】

item.title: 毛里求斯计划采取激励措施吸引富人，促进经济增长
item.description: 毛里求斯正计划采取激励措施吸引富有的投资者，并将更多外国资本引入其金融服务部门，以促进经济增长和稳定公共财政。【原文：Mauritius is planning incentives to attract wealthy investors and channel more foreign capital into its financial-services sector to bolster economic growth and stabilize public finances.】

item.title: 英国关键住房目标受制于谨慎的住宅建筑商
item.description: 英国政府已将促进住宅建设作为其增长计划的核心目标。而实际交付这些住宅的公司已经告诉股东们，他们无法实现这一目标。【原文：The UK government has put a target to boost homebuilding at the center of its growth plans. The companies that will actually deliver those homes are already telling shareholders they won’t get close to achieving it.】

item.title: 台湾调查中国芯片制造商中芯国际涉嫌挖走员工
item.description: 台湾正在调查中国领先的芯片制造商中芯国际集成电路制造有限公司（Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp.【原文：Taiwan is investigating whether China’s leading chipmaker Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp. illegally poached local engineers as part of an effort to access the island’s cutting-edge chip technology.】

item.title: 印度 BSE 指数因竞争对手推迟更改到期日而反弹
item.description: 印度历史最悠久的证券交易所 BSE Ltd. 的股价创下自 12 月以来的最大涨幅，因为其竞争对手交易所推迟了一项被认为有可能增加其市场份额的计划。【原文：India’s oldest stock exchange BSE Ltd. saw its shares surge the most since December, after its rival bourse deferred a plan that was seen potentially increasing its market share.】

item.title: 寻求对冲，灵活应对：宏观交易员为关税日制定计划
item.description: 从纽约到伦敦和香港，投资者在下周宣布关税之前都在削减风险，同时保留现金，以备在机会出现时立即出手。【原文：From New York to London and Hong Kong, investors are cutting back risk ahead of next week’s tariff announcements, while keeping cash ready to pounce the moment opportunities arise.】

item.title: 澳元实际收益率飙升 对抗高昂生活成本
item.description: 澳大利亚政府宣布计划在大选年加大发债力度，以减轻选民的生活费用压力，因此澳大利亚经通胀调整后的债券收益率跃升至十多年来的最高点。【原文：Australia’s inflation-adjusted bond yields jumped to the highest in over a decade as the government announced plans to ramp up debt issuance in an election year to alleviate cost-of-living pressure on voters.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Dymon 聘请前新加坡交易所高管
item.description: 戴蒙亚洲资本（Dymon Asia Capital）聘请了新加坡交易所（Singapore Exchange Ltd.）批发市场和平台部前主管 Lee Beng Hong，负责监管其财务、交易和技术职能。【原文：Dymon Asia Capital has hired Lee Beng Hong, the former head of wholesale markets and platforms at Singapore Exchange Ltd. to oversee its treasury, trading and technology functions.】

item.title: 船东正在调整合同以应对美国对中国船舶征税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，船东和租船人正在修改租赁合同，以应对特朗普政府预计将对中国建造的船只征收的数百万美元港口费。【原文：Shipowners and charterers are altering leasing contracts to cope with the multi-million dollar port fees expected to be imposed on Chinese-built vessels by the Trump administration, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 习近平会见全球商界领袖，中国寻求吸引投资者
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平在北京会见了一批全球商界领袖，在关税不断上涨给经济和国际贸易带来不确定性之际，努力提振投资者情绪。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping has met with a group of global business leaders in Beijing, in an effort to boost investor sentiment as rising tariffs fuel uncertainty for the economy and international trade.】

item.title: 民调显示印尼将在暂停后的第二季度降息
item.description: 印尼央行上周决定维持借贷成本不变，决策者当时强调了保护印尼盾的重要性，此后，印尼央行有望恢复降息。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank is expected to resume interest rate cuts following last week’s decision to leave borrowing costs unchanged, when policymakers stressed the importance of safeguarding the rupiah.】

item.title: 供应混乱可能很快结束，铜价延续跌势
item.description: 铜价从九个月高位回落，原因是市场预期美国即将加征关税可能会提前结束供应混乱。【原文：Copper extended its retreat from nine-month high on expectations that supply dislocations — fueled by upcoming US tariffs — may end sooner than expected.】

item.title: MUFG 预计更多中国企业走出国门将增加收入

item.title: 韩华世界第一的 3,100% 拉力赛测试国防繁荣的极限
item.description: 韩国韩华航空航天公司（Hanwha Aerospace Co.）已成为全球表现最好的国防股，因为投资者押注美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对安全联盟的颠覆将刺激武器购买热潮，尤其是该公司几十年来一直生产的价格低廉的常规武器。【原文：South Korea’s Hanwha Aerospace Co. has emerged as the world’s best-performing defense stock as investors bet the upending of security alliances by US President Donald Trump will spur a buying spree for weapons, particularly in the affordable conventional arms the company’s been making for decades.】

item.title: 高盛放弃 4 月澳洲央行降息，仍认为会议 "千钧一发
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. economists pushed back their call for Australia’s next interest-rate cut to May from next week, citing uncertainty in domestic politics as well as the global trade outlook.】

item.title: 万科、中海地产利润历史性下滑后出现复苏迹象
item.description: 在中国房地产业出现复苏迹象的背景下，中国万科企业股份有限公司和中国海外发展有限公司等大型开发商将于下周公布业绩报告。【原文：China Vanke Co., Ltd. and China Overseas Land & Investment Ltd. are among the major developers reporting next week amid signs of recovery in the Chinese property sector.】

item.title: 石场承诺采取措施保护就业免受特朗普汽车关税影响
item.description: 日本首相石破茂承诺将采取彻底措施，保护当地就业不受特朗普政府对美国进口汽车征收 25% 关税的影响，他说这将对日本经济产生 "非常大 "的影响。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba pledged to take thorough measures to protect local jobs from the Trump administration’s 25% tariff on US car imports, which he said will have a “very big” impact on the nation’s economy.】

item.title: 新日铁因 70 亿美元美国钢铁投资报告而下滑
item.description: 周五，新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.）股价暴跌，原因是有报道称，如果该公司以 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的提议获得批准，该公司正考虑投资多达 70 亿美元升级美国钢铁公司的设施。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. shares slumped on Friday on a report that the company is considering investing as much as $7 billion to upgrade United States Steel Corp. facilities if it wins approval for its proposed $14.1 billion takeover.】

item.title: 富士媒体高管 Hieda 辞职后股价上涨
item.description: 日本陷入困境的广播公司富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：The share price of Japanese embattled broadcaster Fuji Media Holdings Inc. climbed after its powerful 87-year-old former chairman and executive management adviser, Hisashi Hieda, resigned from the board.】

item.title: 韩国锌业准备召开最近一次风波不断的股东大会
item.description: 周五，韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.【原文：Korea Zinc Co. investors are bracing for a turbulent gathering on Friday, as the metals giant’s top shareholder and private equity ally MBK Partners Ltd prepare to make a fresh bid to topple the current board and oust Chief Executive Yun B. Choi.】

item.title: 达美泰国在损失 300 亿美元后成为亚洲最差股票
item.description: 就在四个月前，台达电子（泰国）有限公司（Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl）的股价还在全球同行中遥遥领先，促使泰国市场当局采取了一系列措施来阻止其涨势。而现在，该股的走势却截然相反。【原文：Just four months ago, Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl’s shares were outpacing global peers, prompting a series of moves from Thai market authorities to halt the rally. Now, the stock is in a stark reversal.】

item.title: 英国家庭能源债务达 37 亿英镑，更多家庭面临贫困
item.description: 英国家庭正积累着 "令人担忧 "的巨额能源账单债务，因为他们面临着世界上最高的能源价格，而政府的福利改革将使更多人陷入贫困。【原文：UK households are accumulating a “worryingly” large amount of energy bill debt as they face some of the highest prices in the world, at a time when government welfare reforms are set to push more into poverty.】

item.title: 新加坡边境需求增长推动马来西亚巴士公司上市
item.description: 马来西亚巴士运营商 HI Mobility Bhd 将新加坡边境的交通流量增长作为公司增长的动力，该公司准备在周五开始上市交易，这在该国交通服务提供商中实属罕见。【原文：Malaysian bus operator HI Mobility Bhd. is betting on increased traffic at the Singapore border to drive growth as the company readies to start trading Friday after a rare listing by one of the country’s transport providers.】

item.title: 东京通胀加速，日本央行将继续加息
item.description: 东京的生活成本上涨速度略快于上个月，这使得日本央行继续保持逐步加息的步伐。【原文：The cost of living in Tokyo rose at a slightly faster pace than the previous month, keeping the Bank of Japan on track for gradual interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 在特朗普征收更多关税之前，石油有望实现第三周上涨
item.description: 在市场为下周初特朗普政府将征收更多关税做好准备之际，石油价格迎来了第三次周线上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a third weekly advance as the market braced for more tariffs from the Trump administration due early next week.】
